name: Introduction to Community Development

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1) Addams, Jane, Twenty Years at Hull House, University of Illinois, 1990.
2) Alinsky, Saul D., Rules for Radicals, Vintage Press, 1971.
3) Medoff, Peter and Sklar, Holly, Streets of Hope: The Fall and Rise of an Urban Neighborhood, South End Press, 1994.
